short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically insert CSS rules into a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After installing this extension, one can define a map from (URL) "regular expression" to "CSS Rule strings"Automatically inserting CSS rules when URL matched. When the URL matches the regular expression, the corresponding CSS code will be injected. 

This extension is especially useful for applying some tiny modifications on appearance for some web pages.
